text: Ohe manabagosthi! Niscaya'i rasula tomadera kache esechena tomadera prabhura kacha theke satyasaha, ata'eba imana ano, tomadera jan'ya ta mangalajanaka. Kintu yadi tomara abisbasa posana karo tabe nihsandeha allahâ€Œra'i ya-kichu ache mahakasa-mandale o ya-kichu prthibite. Ara allah hacchena sarbajnata, paramajnani.
